mapper.insert: insert into user_profile (user_id, profile_nickname, image_filename, is_default, is_url) value (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{filename}, #{isDefault}, #{isUrl})
mapper.select: select profile_no as no, user_id as id, profile_nickname nickname, image_filename as filename, is_default, is_url from user_profile where user_id = #{id} and is_default = 1
select profile_no as no, user_id as id, profile_nickname nickname, image_filename as filename, is_default, is_url from user_profile where profile_no = #{no}
SELECT profile_no as no, user_id as id, profile_nickname nickname, image_filename as filename, is_default, is_url FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = #{value} ORDER BY is_default DESC
mapper.update: update user_profile set profile_nickname = #{nickname}, image_filename = #{filename}, is_url = #{isUrl}, is_default = #{isDefault} where profile_no = #{no}
